file_content.text: Hey, do you know why they're cutting everybody's hours down this week?
Keep it down! It's a security thing, happens every few weeks. They don't like people asking, so don't ask.
Nobody said anything when I signed on. Blast it... knew I should've taken that Ilum job. Minos-Mestra wouldn't jerk their crews around like this.
Wow... they let just about anyone buy fuel at this place.
When all of those scumbags buy fuel, they're paying for our salaries. You get that, right?
Attention! Security lockdown is in effect! Obey the commands of security personnel without resistance!
Suspect is a male Devaronian, Gault Rennow, in possession of a contraband explosive device. If you see him, contact security at once!
Security lockdown in the docks sector has been canceled. Return to work immediately!
All security lockdowns have been canceled. Lost work hours will not be reimbursed!
